field.name: summary
field.value: ActiveRecord OneToOne attribute's "constrained" parameter doesn't appears in a NHibernate mappings

field.name: description
field.value:
ActiveRecords OneToOne relationship attribute has the "constrained" parameter, that has two issues: 1. XmlGenerationVisitor, that is used to generate NHibernate mappings, has a bug, that incorrectly handles the "constrained" parameter, so that it doesn't appear in a mappings. 2. Unit tests does incorrectly use this "constrained" parameter and doesn't expect it in the output.
Have changed unit tests, and corrected the XmlGenerationVisitor code.
